content: *p6 5 cdd knitwise p5 4 sm to end row 5-14 below worked in stockinette stitch knit all row round 5 and all odd numbered row knit all stitches round 6 *k1 yo k4 3 cdd k4 3 yo sm repeat to end of round round 8 *k2 yo k3 2 cdd k3 2 yo k1 sm repeat to end round 10 *k3 2 yo k2 1 cdd k2 1 yo k2 1 sm repeat to end round 12 *k4 3 yo k1 0 cdd k1 0 yo k3 2 sm repeat to end for size small proceed to garter stitch edge here omit round 14 round 14 *k5 yo cdd yo k4 sm repeat to end switch back to garter stitch for final 4 row no more decreases bobble all stitches loosely weave in ends i prefer jeny s suprisingly stretchy bind off http //knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php but some find a sewn bind off works well
